segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, seemingly lost in her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over the edge of the sink, creating a pool on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already in that puddle, but she seems completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something so calm about her, as if nothing around her is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window casts a warm glow over the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that boy on the stool is a disaster waiting to happen; I can hardly believe he’s climbing like that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how he thinks he can reach those cookies without falling off.
segments.speaker: PAR
